title: No Blue Essence mission
body: Does anyone know why I haven't got my blue essence mission? My game patched and all things and I don't see it in the missions tab..

replies.body: same for me
Same here ... please what can i do?
same problem here
Me and my brother have the same issue, after we restarted our clients our missions disappeared. We hadn't even played a game yet and they're gone. There is nothing in loot nor in completed missions.
Same here
Same here, all my friends have this mission, expect me. Riot pls, gimme my BE xD
You don't understand, to get the essence mission you needed to have bought at least 1 rune page before September 1st

Hey there, this specific account didn't purchase any runes that were eligible for the conversion.  In this case, there's no mission that would contain capsules.  I do see that you bought runes, but it was after the cut off date of[ September 1st](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lEF4iRjk-blue-is-the-newip-click-here-for-faq).  Sorry about that!
I got runes too but I don't know when I got them, is there any way for me to check if it was after the cutoff?
Hey there, I checked into this for you and the majority of your runes and pages where obtained September 25 to October.  In this case, there wouldn't be a capsule mission for additional BE.
So i will not have a mission for blue essence ??? :((
you just have to play a matchmade game to receive the essence.
This is so dumb the same thing happened to me on EUNE.
Same as me.My friends already did the mission, but I still cannot see it.
Why riot do you have to do this
Uh silly me thought I didn't have the blue orbs because I assumed it automatically updated. Check the loot if your like me.{{champion:432}}

i got the mission for only 4k blue essence which was fine but now the mission is gone i tried to restart nothing so then i played a game with runes nothing is it something on my end i did wrong or your end?
Me either, I don't know why all my friends got it and none of them ever bought runes
Same here, and I have bought plenty of runes.

Same here: Mac IOS SIERRA; after update no mission; my son has the mission on the pc
edit: problem solved on its own
